examples.example: 我答应妈妈会努力学习，取得更好的成绩。

translate.english: I promised my mother that I would study hard and achieve better results.

examples.example: 我答应朋友周末一起去爬山，享受美好的自然风光。

translate.english: I promised my friend to go climbing together on the weekend and enjoy the beautiful natural scenery.

examples.example: 我答应老师会认真完成作业，不断提升自己。

translate.english: I promised the teacher that I would finish the homework seriously and continuously improve myself.
